name: Lumona
long_description: Lumona is an AI-enabled search engine featuring perspectives from social media to help you understand your search results. When youâ€™re looking to buy a new phone, instead of Googling iPhone 15 reviews and opening multiple reddit threads, blog reviews, and YouTube videos to know if you want to buy it, you can search once on Lumona to get all of that info on one page.
one_liner: AI-enabled search engine featuring perspectives from social media.
